statements.update: update ASET_KIBMUTASI set TGLMUTASIKEL=#Tglmutasikel#,KET=#Ket# where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and UNITKEY2=#Unitkey2# and NOMUTASIKEL=#Nomutasikel#
update ASET_KIBMUTASI set TGLMUTASITER=#Tglmutasiter# where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and UNITKEY2=#Unitkey2# and NOMUTASIKEL=#Nomutasikel#

update ASET_KIBMUTASI set TGLMUTASITER = null where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and UNITKEY2=#Unitkey2# and NOMUTASIKEL=#Nomutasikel# update ASET_KIBMUTASIDET set STATUS = 0 where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and UNITKEY2=#Unitkey2# and NOMUTASIKEL=#Nomutasikel#
update ASET_KIBMUTASI set REV_BY=#Rev_by# and REV_DATE=#Rev_date#
update ASET_KIBMUTASI set REV_BY='' and REV_DATE=null
statements.select: select A.ID, A.UNITKEY, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT, A.UNITKEY2, D2.KDUNIT AS KDUNIT2, D2.NMUNIT AS NMUNIT2 , A.NOMUTASIKEL, A.TGLMUTASIKEL, A.KDTANS, J.NMTRANS, A.KET, A.TGLMUTASITER , ltrim(rtrim(D.KDUNIT))+' - '+ltrim(rtrim(D.NMUNIT)) KDNMUNIT , ltrim(rtrim(D2.KDUNIT))+' - '+ltrim(rtrim(D2.NMUNIT)) KDNMUNIT2 from ASET_KIBMUTASI A left join JTRANS J ON J.KDTANS = A.KDTANS left join DAFTUNIT D ON D.UNITKEY = A.UNITKEY left join DAFTUNIT D2 ON D2.UNITKEY = A.UNITKEY2
where 1=1 and A.Unitkey=#Unitkey# and year(A.TGLMUTASIKEL) = (select CONFIGVAL from PEMDA where CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')
where 1=1 and A.Unitkey2=#Unitkey# and year(A.TGLMUTASIKEL) = (select CONFIGVAL from PEMDA where CONFIGID = 'cur_thang')
where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.UNITKEY2=#Unitkey2# and A.NOMUTASIKEL=#Nomutasikel#

select sum(x.NOBAMUTASI) as JMLKIB from ( select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAMUTASI from ASET_KIBADET where KDTANS='205' and UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nomutasikel# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAMUTASI from ASET_KIBBDET where KDTANS='205' and UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nomutasikel# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAMUTASI from ASET_KIBCDET where KDTANS='205' and UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nomutasikel# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAMUTASI from ASET_KIBDDET where KDTANS='205' and UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nomutasikel# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAMUTASI from ASET_KIBEDET where KDTANS='205' and UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nomutasikel# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOBAMUTASI from ASET_KIBGDET where KDTANS='205' and UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nomutasikel#) x
